spells.name: Alchemical Allocation
spells.description: Gain potion's benefits without consuming it.

spells.name: Fire Breath
spells.description: Exhale a cone of flame at will.

spells.name: Transmute Potion to Poison
spells.description: Spit poison onto weapon after drinking potion.

spells.name: Vomit Swarm
spells.description: Produces a spider swarm that fights for you.
